name: places/ChIJSUGqdz1awokRyOekYHBj1HA
formattedAddress: 50 Water St #7, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 50 Water St #7, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text:
As a MetroPlus Health client, I have received terrible service at different stages of my enrollment with them.
Their enrollment specialists only care to enroll you in their health plan. Most of them do not even try or can’t answer your questions. Heavily represented in public
hospitals or near immigration facilities. They often use advantage over minorities
and immigrant communities who don’t understand how the healthcare system
works.
Their phone support specialists are often rude and don’t want to provide sufficient
explanations. They will ignore you if you ask for a translation. Which is unacceptable considering the diversity of communities they serve.
And even if you decide to visit their office in person, you can be discriminated against by their unprofessional security trying to find any reason to turn you away.
There are a lot of 5-star reviews written in a similar manner which is suspicious.
Looks like they are written by their representatives who are encouraged by their organization for good reviews.
I recommend choosing a different organization for your health insurance. The one that respects their clients and has professional and caring representatives.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of calling MetroPlusHealth for phone support and was delighted with the experience. The representatives were empathetic, solution-focused, and consistently customer-centered. Although there was a long wait time, the clear phone menu kept me informed and assured that my call was important.

One representative, Ezekiel, stood out from the rest. He was extremely helpful, informed, attentive, patient, and respectful throughout our conversation. His engaging manner made me feel like my concerns were being heard and that I was receiving top-notch service.

Overall, I would highly recommend MetroPlusHealth for their caring and trustworthy approach to customer service. While wait times may be longer than ideal, the attentive support provided by their staff more than makes up for it.

originalText.text:
If you're looking for a health insurance provider that truly cares about their customers, you can't go wrong with MetroPlusHealth. Their phone support team is simply outstanding, offering empathetic and solution-focused service that is always consistent and customer-centered. It's clear that they genuinely care about their clients and are committed to providing a trustworthy and delightful experience.

I especially appreciated how easy it was to get answers when I had questions - there was never a long wait time on the phone. And when I spoke with Anthony, a CS representative, I found him to be incredibly helpful, informed, attentive, patient, and respectful. With such excellent service from the MetroPlusHealth team, I feel confident in my decision to trust them with my health insurance needs.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of calling MetroPlusHealth's phone support and I have to say, it was a delightful experience. The representatives were all so caring and empathetic in their approach, always keeping the customer at the center of their attention. The phone menu was easy to navigate, and I never had to wait too long before speaking with a representative.

Speaking of which, I specifically interacted with a representative named Miguel who was incredibly helpful in every regard. He was informed on everything I asked about, and he patiently listened to my questions and concerns, demonstrating a true engagement in our conversation. Additionally, Miguel exhibited a strong sense of respect towards me as a customer, which only added to my faith in MetroPlusHealth as a trustworthy company.

Overall, I would highly recommend MetroPlusHealth for anyone looking for exceptional phone support services. They truly provide a solution-focused experience that consistently puts the customer first.

originalText.text:
I recently contacted MetroPlusHealth via phone support and was blown away by the exceptional service I received. The customer service representative Wendy was incredibly helpful, informed, and attentive throughout our conversation. She was patient with my inquiries and always treated me with respect, making me feel valued as a customer.

The phone support provided by MetroPlusHealth was solution-focused and consistent, leaving me with no doubt that the team is truly customer-centered and cares about providing trustworthy assistance to those in need. It was refreshing to have such an easy and delightful experience speaking with them - I did not experience significant wait times or difficulty getting answers to my questions.

Overall, I highly recommend MetroPlus Health's phone support system for anyone looking for efficient, friendly, and reliable assistance. Wendy's exceptional service left a lasting impression on me, and I appreciate the attention given to my needs as a customer. Keep up the great work!
